message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to enhance your daily routine and bring convenience to your life. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it's worth more than $80. Would you like to purchase it at this special introductory price?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $80?
